name: MercekDaemon
body:
![mercekDlogo](http://i.imgur.com/IKDeu0I.png)
### ISC DHCP Log Analyzer
MercekDaemon is a free software tool for analysis of real-time ISC DHCP log data and interactive viewer that runs in browser.

![mercekDss](http://i.imgur.com/qOa5jJc.png?1)

### AUTHORS

* [Faruk Uzun](https://github.com/farukuzun) <farukuzun@mail.com>
    - Çanakkale Onsekiz Mart Üniversitesi Bilgisayar Mühendisliği öğrencisi
    - http://twitter.com/ofuzun

* [Halil Bay](https://github.com/halilbay) <halilbay91@gmail.com>
    - Eskişehir Osmangazi Üniversitesi Bilgisayar Mühendisliği öğrencisi

* [Oğuz Yarımtepe](https://github.com/oguzy) <oguzyarimtepe@gmail.com>
    - Sistem yöneticisi, yazılım geliştirici, Linux sever, Ph.D öğrencisi
    - http://about.me/oguzy

## LICENCE

MercekDaemon is available under the [GPLv3](http://gplv3.fsf.org/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
